boat.name: Moonshine
boat.full_description: Moonshine is hull number 3 of the Norfolk Smuggler Class.
boat.short_description: Moonshine is a Norfolk Smuggler built in 1996

for_sales.sales_text:
A pretty cruising yacht in the traditional style.  With her renowned Norfolk Boatyard high quality build that combines modern fittings and traditional materials, Moonshine is a superb small yacht with more volume than you would expect for the 25ft length. With a shallow draft long keel, a high peaked gaff, and an easily operated and unobtrusive centreplate, she has impressive performance to windward. Moonshine has been with her current owners since 2010 and has been well maintained, including having the engine professionally removed and reconditioned (2015), the addition of a pushpit with boarding ladder deployable from the water, and the fitting of beaching legs to increase cruising grounds and access to drying harbours.

Full details can be seen on her website: www.moonshineofslaughden.co.uk
